column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////One of the few places I've found that has a vegan and vegetarian ramen option that is actually tasty! I've enjoyed their spicy chicken noodle ramen as well. Love their pork steam buns
column2: though I personally didn't care for their beyond version of the same. The prices are high
column3: but their food definitely hits the spot every time we order from here (or dined in person pre-pandemic). Â There's a menu item for every palate. Worth checking out!
